metadata.name: Mal-k & Bava The Myth & The Ancient Stone Brothers
metadata.description:
These two were inspired by myths & statue from Indonesia. Mal-K is a fictional character adapted from the Malin Kundang folklore but with a twist. Heâ€™s a famous singer who treated his mother badly & then turned to stone.

While his partner, Bava, is an adaptation of a megalithic statue from Bada Valley, Central Sulawesi. The real statue is called Palindo, which means entertainer. After he fell asleep for 2000-5000 years, he's finally awake & in his new life he wants to be a real entertainer by becoming a rapper.

Both Mal-K & Bava agreed to do a collaboration and join forces 

3968 x 2469 px
300dpi
